code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let getdate=note=>{return new Date(note.updated).toLocaleDateString();};let getTitle=note=>{let title=note.body.split('\n')[0];if(title.length>10){title.slice(0,10);}return title;};const ListItem=_ref=>{let{note}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/note/".concat(note.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:getTitle(note)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:getdate(note)})})]})});};export default ListItem;
